abstract: Robert J Shiller Economic View column suggests Americans take bite out of unemployment by going to work on nation's infrastructure, key component of Pres Obama's jobs bill.
snippet: Just as farmers work on their barns and fences during the coldest months, the nation could work on its infrastructure by building upon key parts of President Obama’s jobs bill.
lead_paragraph: Just as farmers work on their barns and fences during the coldest months, the nation could work on its infrastructure by building upon key parts of President Obama’s jobs bill.

headline.main: Making the Most of Our Financial Winter
headline.seo: A Proven Principle Behind Obama’s Jobs Plan
headline.print_headline: Making the Most Of Our Financial Winter
